verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil אַשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> Blessed נְֽשׂוּי־ <WH5375> [is] forgiven פֶּ֗שַׁע <WH6588> [is he whose] transgression כְּס֣וּי <WH3680> [is] covered חֲטָאָֽה׃ <WH2401> [whose] sin

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed אָדָ֗ם <WH120> [is] the man לֹ֤א <WH3808> does not יַחְשֹׁ֬ב <WH2803> imputeth יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto whom the LORD ל֣וֹ עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> not iniquity וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> there בְּרוּח֣וֹ <WH7307> and in whose spirit רְמִיָּה׃ <WH7423> [there is] no guile

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי <WH2790> When I kept silence בָּל֣וּ <WH1086> waxed old עֲצָמָ֑י <WH6106> my bones בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י <WH7581> through my roaring כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> all the day

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> For יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> For day וָלַיְלָה֮ <WH3915> and night תִּכְבַּ֥ד <WH3513> was heavy עָלַ֗י <WH5921> and יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <WH3027> thy hand נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> is turned לְשַׁדִּ֑י <WH3955> upon me my moisture בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי <WH2725> into the drought קַ֣יִץ <WH7019> of summer סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

חַטָּאתִ֨י <WH2403> my sin אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ <WH3045> I acknowledged וַעֲוֹ֘נִ֤י <WH5771> unto thee and mine iniquity לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not כִסִּ֗יתִי <WH3680> have I not hid אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I said אוֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> I will confess עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> and פְ֭שָׁעַי <WH6588> my transgressions לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> and You נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ <WH5375> and thou forgavest עֲוֹ֖ן <WH5771> the iniquity חַטָּאתִ֣י <WH2403> of my sin סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֡את <WH2063> likewise יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל <WH6419> pray כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone חָסִ֨יד ׀ <WH2623> For this shall every one that is godly אֵלֶיךָ֮ <WH413> to you לְעֵ֪ת <WH6256> unto thee in a time מְ֫צֹ֥א <WH4672> when thou mayest be found רַ֗ק <WH7535> in לְ֭שֵׁטֶף <WH7858> surely in the floods מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> of great אֵ֝לָ֗יו <WH413> about לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <WH5060> they shall not come nigh

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> You סֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> Thou [art] my hiding place לִי֮ מִצַּ֪ר <WH6862> me from trouble תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי <WH5341> thou shalt preserve רָנֵּ֥י <WH7438> me about with songs פַלֵּ֑ט <WH6405> of deliverance תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי <WH5437> thou shalt compass סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨ ׀ <WH7919> I will instruct וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ <WH3384> thee and teach בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> thee in the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> which תֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> go אִֽיעֲצָ֖ה <WH3289> I will guide עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> with עֵינִֽי׃ <WH5869> thee with mine eye

אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּֽהְי֤וּ ׀ <WH1961> become כְּס֥וּס <WH5483> Be ye not as the horse כְּפֶרֶד֮ <WH6505> [or] as the mule אֵ֤ין <WH369> have הָ֫בִ֥ין <WH995> [which] have no understanding בְּמֶֽתֶג־ <WH4964> in with bit וָרֶ֣סֶן <WH7448> and bridle עֶדְי֣וֹ <WH5716> whose mouth לִבְל֑וֹם <WH1102> must be held בַּ֝֗ל <WH1077> lest קְרֹ֣ב <WH7126> they come near אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> Many מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים <WH4341> sorrows לָרָ֫שָׁ֥ע <WH7563> [shall be] to the wicked וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> but he that trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> mercy יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5437> shall compass

שִׂמְח֬וּ <WH8055> Be glad בַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD וְ֭גִילוּ <WH1523> and rejoice צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> ye righteous וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ <WH7442> and shout כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> for joy all [ye that are] upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart
